entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-08-26
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [Feature Suggestion] Disable execution of specific Roslyn analyzers or code fixes during build and design-time (live analysis) #69733

Closed

  • C# Laungage Service is crash if UNITY project contains class named "Program" inherit MonoBehaviour #69525
    17.8

PullRequests

Created

  • Use raw strings in EditorFeatures tests #69729
    Area-IDE, untriaged

Merged

  • Cache regexes used for embedded language detection #69725
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Pool lexed token arrays in SyntaxParser. #69499
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Collection expression conversions: check elements are convertible #69627
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Collection Expressions
  • Provide dedicated classifications for embedded C# in test code. #61197
    Area-IDE
  • Add granular opt-in property for interceptors #69712
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Fix NRT annotations in ASP.net EA api #69726
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Run design time builds out-of-process #69616
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Bind fully-typed lambda only once for error recovery #69695
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
